jobDescription: Job description  Beginning Years Child Development Center seeks ECE certified Preschool Teacher.  Educational qualifications include a minimum of AS degree in ECE. Teaching experience with children 2.9-5yrs a plus.  Our center has been in operation since 1987 and is NAEYC accredited. We are licensed for 57 children. Our Preschool classroom has 4 teachers for 20 children. We have an active and involved Parent Board. Curriculum is designed to meet children's individual cognitive and social needs, with an emphasis on community involvement.  We are looking for a teacher with similar educational philosophy, who is passionate about working with young children. Must be able to communicate effectively and positively with parents and co-workers, be a flexible team player and is interested in long term employment. Please send resume to: info@beginningyears.com
